name: Xmasss Terror
description:
Xmasss Terror is a twin-stick shooter game. You walk, throw snowballs, and star grenades. This is a game that might require you to be especially reactive. The game was made in two weeks by three people, two programmers, and one 3D artist.

Currently, the game is in beta. Plans are to add more features to the game.

TOOLS USED:

- Unity 2019: https://unity.com/

- Blender: https://www.blender.org/

- Gimp: https://www.gimp.org/

- Inkscape: https://inkscape.org/

- Fonts: https://www.dafont.com/

- Sounds and Music: Unity Asset Store

CREDITS:

Zoran Gaćeša - https://zgacesa2.itch.io/ - Programmer

Marina Lovreković - https://dutkagames.itch.io/ - 3D Artist

Goran Lochert - https://policeproduction.itch.io/ - Programmer
